name: BunsBuns
description:
Please put the game in Full Screen before playing.

Controls: 
 A, D for movements
 Space for Jump

2D Platformer. Play as the little but mysterious cyborg hamster. Traversing through a city with an unknown purpose, while sometimes affected by his inplant, resulting in uncontrollable glitches.

Credits:

Lukas Brolin - Code and Level Design | https://lukasbrolin.com/
Linn Savert - Art and VFX | https://www.instagram.com/linn.s.art/ 
Torbjørn Svendsen - Music, SFX and Level Design | https://www.torbsaudio.com/

Made with FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.
